parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.75

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Arrays

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Changes the size of the given array. The command does not return new array, it resizes the source array to the desired number of elements. If the new size is bigger than the current size, the new places are filled with [[nil]]s.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> array '''resize''' count

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> array: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> count: [[Number]] - the new number of elements.

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_arrayNum = [0,1,2,3,4];
_arrayNum [[resize]] 2; // _arrayNum is now [0,1]
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Array]], [[set]], [[reverse]], [[select]], [[in]], [[find]], [[findIf]], [[toArray]], [[toString]], [[forEach]], [[count]], [[pushBack]], [[pushBackUnique]], [[apply]], [[deleteAt]], [[deleteRange]], [[append]], [[sort]], [[param]], [[params]], [[arrayIntersect]], [[splitString]], [[joinString]]
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.96|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on November 13, 2014 - 06:26 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:DreadedEntity|DreadedEntity]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Use this number to resize the array to the number of elements desired, not the desired index of the final element.<br>
[[resize]] cannot be used to create a new array.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
